title: FPS still terrible since patch 4.20 No end in sight, food supply low, hope dwindling....
body: And it seems likes its hardcore butt plunging a small portion of the lol population, which means gg

replies.body:
Hey **PenetrationPaul**,

If you are encountering FPS problems, please try the solutions provided by this [Riot Games Support knowledgebase article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting)!

Why does this short and out-of-format post get attention from a Rioteer, but my detailed posts get ignored? 

Rito... :( {{item:3070}} {{item:2045}}
Just to clarify: I'm not a Rioter! Just a volunteer dedicating some of my free time to helping others! Also, I've responded to your post(s) as well!

None of this shit helps! My machine ran the new map like sex prior to a 4.20 change. it was 60 fps without even a hiccup during teamfights on all medium settings.

Now I can't get 60 fps on any settings anytime!

It literllay happened overnight with 4.20.

I've tried all the bullshit in that link - none of it will/did work.

Fuck me! Months of choppy shitty lol. Off to civ5 again!
